Title: Rogue River
Plot: Jake and Eric head out of Jericho to the nearby town of Rogue River to try and acquire some medicine for their father.  While the brothers are at the hospital they encounter a combative group of individuals who call themselves Ravenwood. The brothers find that they?re trapped and must find a way back to Jericho.
GuestStars: Theo Rossi, D.B. Sweeney, Aasif Mandvi
